subject: Baseball
Weight
lead_paragraph: The third baseman came to spring training at 262 pounds, about 15 pounds less than his playing weight last year, when he had 25 homers and 90 runs batted in.
snippet: The third baseman came to spring training at 262 pounds, about 15 pounds less than his playing weight last year, when he had 25 homers and 90 runs batted in.
